aima.core.probability.bayes.approx

Class BayesInferenceApproxAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.probability.bayes.approx.BayesInferenceApproxAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BayesInference

    public class BayesInferenceApproxAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements BayesInference
    An Adapter class to let BayesSampleInference implementations to be used in places where calls are being made to the BayesInference API.
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly
